projects.name: Project pizza
projects.description: This was one of my first coding projects (with almost no coding experience at all) and the task was to create a food order system using alert messages.

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: We were supposed to create a chatbot using different alternatives on the buttons to come forward in the conversation.

projects.name: Story survey
projects.description: This was a team assignment where we worked in pairs. We made a story survey where the user gets different stories depending on the choises the user make.

projects.name: Guess who game
projects.description: In this assignment we were supposed to create a guess who game.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: In this project we were going to make some kind of social media page where the users can post, like and read happy thoughts.

projects.name: Movie site
projects.description: This was a team assignment where we worked in pairs. We fetched the data from an API to create a movie site with the most popular movies right now.

projects.name: Fun fact quiz
projects.description: This was a team assignment where we worked in grous of five. We were going to create a quiz.

projects.name: QR code generator
projects.description: We were supposed to create a QR code generator.

projects.name: Express API project
projects.description: This was our first backend project.

projects.name: Final project
projects.description: This was our final project at the boot camp. We chose to make a story page connected to a map where the users can post stories anonymously and also read other peoples stories. We worked in a group of 4.
